Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Ave/Harlem
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Oak Park, Division, Ridgeland, and North Avenue due to, street blockage near North Ave/Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Oak Park, Division, Ridgeland, and North Avenue due to, street blockage near North Ave/Harlem.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
